title: IBoundaryBossFeatureData.TrimByD1
description: Gets whether to trim surfaces in Direction 1 when curves do not form a closed boundary feature.
returns: True to trim surfaces in Direction 1 when curves do not form a closed boundary feature, false to not
remarks:
This property is only available when curves exist in both Direction 1 and Direction 2.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
